summary:
Made a New lev 60 perk \"Expert Enchanter\"(Extra Effect). who make you able to put two enchantments on the same item must have expert enchanter perk OR you Can put Five enchantments on the same item. Must have \"Master Enchanter\" Perk.
The Mod is Compatible With Vanilla, Dawnguard, Heartfires and DragonBorn. The Mod Is Cleaned With TES5Edit. (Op
descriptionHtml:
Made a New lev 60 perk \"Expert Enchanter\"(Extra Effect). who make you able to put two enchantments on the same item must have expert enchanter perk OR you Can put Five enchantments on the same item. Must have \"Master Enchanter\" Perk.
The Mod is Compatible With Vanilla, Dawnguard, Heartfires and DragonBorn. The Mod Is Cleaned With TES5Edit.

(Optional file with three enchantments) Optional File: Can put Three enchantments on the same item. Must have ExtraEffect Perk.

If you do not get this mod to work Try to:
===============================
* Update you game.
* Unload all other mods and load only this mod to see if it work, if it now work, you have another mod who cancel this mod out.  
* Remove other mods who alter enchanting or the Enchanting Perktree (Fleksible perktree IS Compatible)
* This mod does not work with custom made enchantments or with other mods that alter the Enchanting Perk-tree
author: KennyBall

files.name: Enchanting ExtraEffect
files.changelogHtml: Made a New lev 60 perk "Expert Enchanter". who make you able to put two enchantments on the same item must have expert enchanter perk OR Can put Five enchantments on the same item. Must have "Master Enchanter" Perk.

files.name: Enchanting 5 ExtraEffect
files.changelogHtml: Fixed the issue some users have that they are stuck to two Enchantments even with the MASTER perk
